events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I would like to request a refund as the size is incorrect and the item does not fit me.
The customer case has been categorized under Refund due to the request for money back because of wrong sizing.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah to handle the refund process and assist the customer accordingly.
Hello, I’m Sarah from Customer Support. I understand you want a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund?
My order number is 123456789. Yes, the jacket is still unused and comes with all original tags and packaging intact.
Thank you for the details. You may return the jacket using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and completed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 2 to 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further concerns were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting Customer Support.
